business.headline: US suspends WTO financial contributions: ReportThe Trump administration has reportedly suspended financial contributions to The World Trade Organisation amid efforts to cut back government spending.
Wall Street drifts as auto tariffs hurt GM, help Tesla and othersDonald Trump's auto tariffs impacted Wall Street on Thursday morning, with autogiant General Motors falling by 6.8%.

Trump's 25% auto tariff: Which Indian companies will pay the priceUS President Donald Trump's 25% tariff on car imports will affect a few Indian companies, including Tata Motors, Eicher Motors, and Samvardhana Motherson. These firms ship components to the US and Europe's markets.

Sensex, Nifty close higher: Top gainers and losers, tariff impact and key driversStock market today: Some of the top gainers during today's session were Bajaj Finserv, IndusInd Bank, NTPC, L&T, Ultratech Cement, Hero MotoCorp, Adani Enterprises and BPCL. On the other hand, some of the top losers were Tata Motors, Sun Pharma, Eicher Motors, Apollo Hospitals, Bharti Airtel, Kotak Mahindra Bank and HCLTech.

Sensex ends 318 points higher, Nifty just below 23,600; Tata Motors down 5%Stock market closing bell: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 317.93 points higher at 77,606.43, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 105.10 points to settle at 23,591.95.

Noida, Greater Noida flat registration fees may rise 20-30%According to a draft notification, circle rates in Noida could see a 20% hike, while in Greater Noida, the increase may go up to 30%. The move is expected to make property transactions more expensive in the region.

India may receive reprieve from proposed US tariffs: SourcesIndia may escape the proposed US tariffs and avoid being grouped with nations like China, Mexico, and Canada, according to government sources. Trade talks between the two countries are progressing smoothly, with no signs of a deadlock as the April 2 deadline for US reciprocal tariffs approaches.

RBI may double foreign individual investor limit to 10% in listed firms: ReportForeign portfolio investors (FPIs), pressured by poor earnings, high valuations and prospects of U.S. tariffs, have pulled more than $28 billion out of Indian stocks since September's record high in the benchmark NSE Nifty 50.

Elon Musk leads Hurun Global Rich List despite $100 billion drop in net worthElon Musk has reretained his position as the wealthiest person in the world for the fourth time in five years, becoming the first individual to surpass the $400 billion threshold, noted the Hurun Research report.

US tariff reprieve for India, may not be treated like China, Canada, Mexico: SourcesTrade talks between the two nations are progressing smoothly, with no deadlock expected before the April 2 deadline for US reciprocal tariffs.

Infosys terminates more trainees from Mysuru campus, but offers…: ReportInfosys has terminated more trainees from its Myrusu campus. The IT giant had terminated hundreds of trainees from the same campus just two months ago.

Tata Motors shares slump as US slaps 25% duty on car importsTata Motors stock price: Tata Motors shares slumped 6% in early trade and were trading 5.26% lower at Rs 670.70 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 9.55 am.

Sensex, Nifty gain after opening lower in volatile trade; Wipro rises nearly 2%Stock market opening: While the Sensex opened 100 points lower, it was trading 64.27 points higher at 77,552.77 at around 9.26 am. The Nifty50 was trading 16.75 points higher at 23,503.60.

Top stocks to watch today: Tata Motors, Wipro, JB Chemicals, Infosys, Vedanta, UPLWhile positive cues are likely to support the two leading indices on Dalal Street, US tariff uncertainty looms large. Here are some of the key stocks that will be in focus today.

Stock market on March 27: What to expect from Sensex, Nifty today?Stock market prediction: Nifty and Sensex have gained nearly 2% in the past five sessions, but investors will now be watching to see if the market can recover from Wednesday's drop.

How can India cement its position in the global value chain?With global value chains (GVCs) driving over 70% of international trade, India's growth story hinges on its ability to integrate into and scale within these networks.

Tesla to enter Saudi Arabia as Elon Musk mends rift with kingdomAmerican EV giant Tesla announced its entry into the Saudi Arabian market after company CEO Elon Musk's relations with the Kingdom improved in recent months.

UPI outage hits several users across India, NPCI says issue resolvedThe National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) acknowledged the issue, stating that it was caused by intermittent technical difficulties, resulting in partial transaction failures.
Wall Street is drifting again after getting whipsawed for weeksThe New York Stock Exchange saw a steady opening on Wednesday with marginal drops for S&P 500 and the Nasdaq composite.

Cancer, diabetes drugs under government price control to get costlier: SourcesGovernment-controlled medicines, including that of cancer, diabetes, heart-related concerns and other antibiotics, are set to become more expensive by 1.7 per cent, government sources told India Today TV's sister publication, Business Today.

Stock market closing: Top gainers and losers on Sensex, NiftyBenchmark indices snapped their seven-day winning streak, as investors turned cautious ahead of the monthly expiry. The S&P BSE Sensex dropped 728.69 points to close at 77,288.50, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 181.80 points, ending the session at 23,486.85.

India may lower duties on Harley-Davidson bikes, bourbon whiskey: SourcesIndia may further reduce import duties on Harley-Davidson motorcycles, US wines, and bourbon whiskey as part of ongoing India-US trade talks, according to sources.

Sensex tumbles over 700 points, Nifty settles below 23,500; IndusInd Bank up 3%Stock market closing bell: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 728.69 points lower to 77,288.50,  while the NSE Nifty50 declined 181.80 points to settle at 23,486.85.

India may cut duties on Harley bikes, bourbon whiskey amid US talks: SourcesThe government had earlier reduced import duties on Harley-Davidson motorcycles from 50% to 40%. Similarly, import duty on Bourbon whisky was reduced from 150% to 100% in the past.

Insurance regulator flags concerns over Star Health's claim settlements: ReportAccording to IRDAI's handbook of insurance statistics, Star Health's incurred claim ratio stood at 66.47% for the financial year 2023-24. This ratio indicates the percentage of premium income that an insurance company pays out in claims.

IndusInd Bank raised $2 billion via market deposits in March: ReportThe country's fifth-largest private sector bank flagged earlier in the month a $175 million hole in its balance sheet, citing accounting discrepancies in its derivatives portfolio.

Sensex down 700 points: Why is stock market down despite FII buying, GDP growth?Stock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex was down 755.50 points to 77,261.69, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 178.80 points to 23,489.85 as of 2:56 pm.

Why are Zomato, Swiggy shares falling today? Check key reasons, price targetsZomato, Swiggy stock price: Today's drop in Zomato and Swiggy's share price comes after a media report suggested that brokerage firm BofA Securities downgraded them.

India's GDP grows 105% in 10 years, now at $4.3 trillion: IMFIndia's economic growth in the past decade has outpaced several major global economies. While India's GDP increased by 105%, the US and China saw growth of 66% and 44%, respectively.

IndusInd Bank shares rise as lender seeks recruiters to hire top executivesIndusInd Bank stock price: The formal search process to fill the top managerial positions at IndusInd Bank is set to begin in April. Reacting to the report, shares of IndusInd Bank rose as much as 3% in early trade.

India on track to surpass Japan's GDP, could overtake Germany by 2027: IMFIndia's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) has more than doubled in the past decade, rising from $2.1 trillion in 2015 to an estimated $4.3 trillion in 2025.
Sensex, Nifty open flat as investors await clarity on US tariffs; Zomato drops 3%Sensex, Nifty open flat as investors await clarity on US tariffs; Zomato drops 3%

Top stocks to watch today: IREDA, BHEL, ONGC, HCLTech, IRFC, NCC and moreTop stocks to watch on March 26: Sensex and Nifty aim to extend gains as markets track global cues. Key stocks in focus include ONGC, Maruti, HCLTech, and NCC amid corporate developments and investment moves shaping today's session.

Sensex, Nifty opening predictions on March 26: What to expect today?Over the last seven sessions, the Nifty and Sensex have risen 5.7%, turning positive for the year so far. This rally has been supported by foreign capital inflows and expectations of stronger domestic economic growth.

BYD overtakes Tesla in 2024 revenue, becomes World's top EV makerBYD surpassed Tesla in revenue, reporting $107 billion in 2024. The Chinese EV giant leads China's auto market, while Tesla faces declining sales, boycotts, and a falling valuation amid industry challenges.

Wall Street drifts ahead of report on US consumer confidenceWall Street saw marginal gains on Tuesday after making gains a day earlier in hopes of the Trump administration potentially softening its next set of tariffs.
ATM cash withdrawals to get costlier from May 1. Here's whyThe Reserve Bank of India has approved a hike in ATM interchange fees, raising cash withdrawal costs for customers from May 1, 2025.

Government drops import duty on key parts for EV batteries, phonesFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said that the government will exempt import duty on 35 items used to make EV batteries and 28 items used in mobile phone manufacturing.

Sensex, Nifty erase gains to close flat amid tariff uncertainty; Zomato down 6%The S&P BSE Sensex closed just 32.81 points above at 78,017.19 after having gained nearly 700 points in the day. Nifty also followed a similar pattern as it ended with just a 10.30 point gain at 23,668.65.

Air India staff to fly economy as airline tackles passenger concerns: ReportThe move is part of Air India's effort to improve its service and customer experience, following criticism over frequent flight delays.

entertainment.headline: Khloé Kardashian's workout routine: The secret behind her stunning transformationKhloé Kardashian's fitness journey features circuit training, high-intensity cardio, and rowing. With consistency, she transformed her body, proving that dedication, varied workouts, and discipline are key to long-term fitness.

Sikandar advance booking: Salman Khan film sees strong sales ahead of releaseSalman Khan's upcoming film, Sikandar, is already a box office sensation with advance bookings nearing Rs 10 crore. The film will release on March 30.

K-pop group NewJeans announce hiatus amid legal dispute, leave fans divided In a pivotal ruling, the Seoul Central District Court has sided with ADOR, restricting K-pop group NewJeans from pursuing independent activities. The decision follows allegations of mistreatment, which ADOR denies, sparking diverse reactions among fans.

Katrina-fication of Vaani Kapoor, says Internet on actor's recent pic. Seen yet?Vaani Kapoor's recent Instagram post gained attention from the Internet due to her uncanny resemblance to Katrina Kaif, leaving the Internet flabbergasted.

Renee Zellweger joins the cast of Only Murders in the Building Season 5American actor Renee Zellweger has joined the cast of Only Murders in the Building Season 5. The news was shared by the show's official social media handle.

Lee Dong-wook on The Divorce Insurance, jokes about alimony, co-stars South Korean actor Lee Dong-wook stars in The Divorce Insurance, a K-drama that presents a unique insurance concept for divorce, highlighting modern relationship dynamics. In an exclusive chat, the actor spoke about the show, his co-stars and more.

Hema Malini raises deepfake concerns in Lok Sabha: This cannot be taken lightlyActor and BJP MP Hema Malini addressed the Lok Sabha about the growing threat of deepfake technology, particularly its impact on celebrities. She emphasised the severe health effects on victims and called for serious attention to this issue.

Oscar-winning director Sean Baker reveals the inspiration behind AnoraAcclaimed director Sean Baker revealed the inspiration behind his latest film, Anora. The film, a collaboration with actor Karren Karagulian, delves into Russian-speaking communities and has won 5 Oscars.

Neha Kakkar on Melbourne concert: Organisers ran away with my moneySinger Neha Kakkar has shared a statement regarding her recently-held Melbourne concert. Kakkar was criticised for breaking down on stage and was booed at the venue after she arrived late.

Jr NTR floored by Japanese fan who learnt Telugu after watching RRRActor Jr NTR, on Thursday, shared a touching incident from Japan where a fan learned Telugu after watching his 2022 film RRR. Along with the video, he also highlighted the cinema's role in bridging cultures in the caption.

When Hayao Miyazaki called machine-made animation 'an insult to life'As Ghibli-style images are going viral, thanks to OpenAI's latest update, an old Hayao Miyazaki clip criticising machine-generated art resurfaced. In the clip, he called such art "creepy stuff" which is "an insult to life".

Empuraan box office: Mohanlal eyes Rs 50 crore opening, Mollywood's biggestMohanlal's L2: Empuraan hit theatres on March 27 worldwide amid massive anticipation. The film is expected to rake in over Rs 50 crore on its opening day, as per reports.
Scooby-Doo live-action series greenlit by NetflixWe have some good news for Scooby-Doo fans. The beloved cartoon is getting the live-action treatment by streaming giant Netflix.

Santosh director calls censor board's ban on film's release heartbreakingSantosh director Sandhya Suri reacted to the film's India being blocked by the censor board. This came after the board demanded extensive and widespread cuts.

Exclusive: Prabhas's team breaks silence on rumours of his weddingIt was rumoured that Telugu superstar Prabhas is finally settling down in life and that he was going to marry the daughter of a businessman. His team responded to the rumours regarding his marriage.

Ji Chang-wook, Son Ye-jin's period drama is finally in production, confirms NetflixNetflix is set to produce 'Scandals', a Korean drama inspired by the 2003 film 'Untold Scandal'. Starring Son Ye-jin, Ji Chang-wook, and Nana, this series explores love and power in the Joseon era.

Dabboo Ratnani on Rekha's new photoshoot: We wrapped up in 20 minutesCelebrity photographer Dabboo Ratnani reveals Rekha called him for a personal shoot. They wrapped up in 20 minutes but spent an hour chatting. The legendary actor was deeply involved in styling, planning every detail.

Aamir Khan vs Salman Khan: Who's the better dancer, Sikandar director respondsBollywood superstars Salman Khan and Aamir Khan recently sat down to discuss the making of Sikandar with director AR Murugadoss. During their chat, the filmmaker answered a number of questions, including who is the better dancer of the two.

Aamir shares Laapataa Ladies audition, fans say Ravi Kishan was 'perfect choice'Aamir Khan shares his audition for Laapataa Ladies. Fans agree Kiran Rao made the right call by casting Ravi Kishan, praising his 'authenticity' and saying Aamir looked 'too elite' for the role.

general news.headline: 3 cops killed in gunfight in J&K's Kathua, 2 terrorists shot deadThree policemen were killed, and two terrorists were gunned down in a gunbattle that broke out between them in Jammu and Kashmir's Kathua on Thursday.

Immigration bill passed in Lok Sabha, Amit Shah says India not a dharamshalaUnion Home Minister Amit Shah said there were some people who wanted to enter India and create unrest, stressing that the country was not a 'dharamshala' and such individuals would be strongly dealt with.

Cash row: Centre to decide on Justice Varma's transfer soon, say sourcesThe case file of Justice Varma has been received by the Centre and is under process along with some other recommendations of the Supreme Court Collegium that have been pending.
5 injured in stabbing attack in Amsterdam, suspect arrestedFive people have sustained injuries in a stabbing incident near Amsterdam's central Dam Square, and a suspect has been taken into custody.

Message to India? Yunus jets off to China on Bangladesh Independence DayThe head of Bangladesh's interim government, Muhammad Yunus, chose to fly to Beijing on the country's Independence Day. A senior Bangladesh official called the visit a "message". A day earlier, PM Modi sent a message on "mutual sensitivity". What are the messages, and what do they convey?

Houston University's Lived Hindu Religion course sparks big row in USThe University of Houston's Lived Hindu Religion course has sparked a controversy after a student accused it of distorting Hinduism and promoting "Hinduphobia". A lecture video even calls Indian PM Narendra Modi a "Hindu fundamentalist". The US university told India Today Digital that the concerns were being reviewed.

How will new Immigration Act stop illegal entry into India?The Immigration and Foreigners Bill, 2025, is aimed at regulating the entry, stay, and departure of foreigners in India. It replaces older immigration laws to make processes smoother and ensure national security, and it clearly defines the rights and responsibilities of both immigrants and authorities.

KKR pitch controversy explained: Why are critics slamming Eden curator?All is not well at the Kolkata Knight Riders' home at the Eden Gardens. After just one match in Kolkata, tensions are flaring up between the side and Eden pitch curator Sujan Mukherjee. Here's everything we know.

Nobody honours the weak: Rahul Gandhi to Bihar Congress leaders ahead of pollsCongress MP Rahul Gandhi held a meeting with party leaders from Bihar in the run-up to the upcoming Assembly polls in the state and said the time had come to work on its weaknesses and present a united front.

India in touch with US over accommodation of religious sensitivities of deporteesLast month, one of the 112 Indians deported from the US to Amritsar alleged that the US Army threw his turban (dastar) in the dustbin after forcing him to take it out.

Amused: Nirmala Sitharaman banks on humour as Raghav Chadha flags banking woesThe banter between Nirmala Sitharaman and Raghav Chadha took place in Rajya Sabha during a discussion on the Banking Laws (Amendment) Bill.
What's Your Raashee? 51% of Indian singles prioritise zodiac compatibility: SurveyThe art of 'Kundali Matching' or horoscope matching has been practised in India since the Vedic times.

Karnataka hikes milk, curd prices by Rs 4 starting April 1A month after the Karnataka Milk Federation proposed Rs 5 per litre hike in Nandini milk prices, state Animal Husbandry Minister K Venkatesh announced a Rs 4 hike across all varieties, effective from April 1.

US religious freedom report sparks row, spotlight on Pak-origin commissionerAfter the United States Commission on International Religious Freedom (USCIRF) annual report sparked a row, the spotlight is on the agency's Pak-origin Commissioner Asif Mahmood. Read on to know more about him and the controversy.

Cash row: Chief Justice to consider demand of bar bodies on judge's transferThe presidents of six bar associations met the CJI on Thursday amid the row over the transfer of Justice Yashwant Varma, in whose residence a huge amount of cash was found.

Ghibli-style memes are what the Internet is obsessing over today. No surprise thereWith the help of the tool, social media users created Ghibli-inspired AI-generated images and memes that went viral on X and Instagram, fuelling a viral trend.

Pakistan rattled as Baloch women turn suicide bombersIt was a woman suicide bomber of the BLA's elite Majeed Brigade who blew herself in Kalat recently, causing death and destruction to the Pakistani army. Once silent victims, Baloch women from diverse backgrounds are now at the forefront of a growing resistance against the joint exploitation of Balochistan by Pakistan and China. Here's what's driving this trend.

Hyderabad priest who killed lover, sealed body in septic tank gets life sentenceA Hyderabad court sentenced priest Venkata Sai Surya Krishna to life imprisonment for murdering Apsara, a woman he had an affair with. He killed her after she pressured him for marriage and buried her body.

Meeting with Elon Musk, Rolex: Ex-pilot swindled of Rs 72 lakh by fraudstersA Faridabad man was duped of Rs 72.16 lakh after scammers posed as Elon Musk's associates, luring him with fake investment opportunities.

L2 Empuraan review: Convenient writing aside, Mohanlal-Prithviraj actioner deliversReleased-Thu Mar 27, 2025L2 Empuraan movie review: Director Prithviraj Sukumaran's Empuraan is a fitting sequel to Lucifer. Mounted on a grand scale, the film displays convenient writing but makes up with stunning visuals.

'Now it's our turn': Putin to visit India soon, first since start of Ukraine warThis will be the first visit by Vladimir Putin, who has cultivated close ties with PM Modi, since the war with Ukraine broke out in 2022.

US cracks down on visa fraud, cancels 2,000 Indian appointments made by 'bots'The US Embassy in India cancelled 2,000 fraudulent visa appointments and suspended related accounts, asserting its zero-tolerance stance on fraud.

Congress workers vs cops outside Odisha assembly, lathicharge, water cannons usedCongress workers clashed with police in Odisha after 14 party MLAs were suspended for disrupting House proceedings. Water cannons were used as protests escalated.

Ella Langley dominates 2025 ACM nominations while Beyoncé and Miranda Lambert miss outElla Langley leads the 2025 ACM Awards nominations with eight nods, including female artist of the year. Meanwhile, Beyoncé's Cowboy Carter and Miranda Lambert's Postcards from Texas are notably absent.

With consistency, she transformed her body, proving that dedication, varied workouts, and discipline are key to long-term fitness.

sports.headline: Unsold at auction, Shardul Thakur reveals Zaheer Khan role in LSG comeback storyIPL 2025, SRH vs LSG: Months after going unsold in the mega auction, Shardul Thakur has made good use of the second chance that has come his way. The all-rounder took four wickets for Lucknow to stop the Hyderabad freight train on Thursday, March 27.

NBA: What is LeBron James and Stephen A. Smith feud about?NBA star LeBron James and sports analyst Stephen A. Smith got caught up in a feud over Smith's comment about LeBron's son, Bronny James, saying that he should go to the G-League and is not ready for NBA action.

MLB Opening Day: Juan Soto's Yankees debut, Paul Skenes faces Sandy Alcántara, and moreBaseball is back! Juan Soto steps up for the Yankees, rookie Paul Skenes battles Cy Young winner Sandy Alcántara, and Opening Day delivers must-watch matchups, thrilling debuts, and early-season drama.

Lord Shardul Thakur memes viral after LSG pacer decimates SRH 300 talksIPL 2025, SRH vs LSG: Shardul Thakur jolted SunRisers Hyderabad, taking two wickets in successive deliveries in the powerplay. He dismissed Abhishek Sharma and Ishan Kishan, who scored a hundred in their first match of the season.

IPL 2025: Past results don't matter, says Stephen Fleming ahead of CSK vs RCBIPL 2025, CSK vs RCB: Chennai Super Kings have a good head-to-head record against Royal Challengers Bengaluru, but head coach Stephen Fleming said the five-time champions will not look into the past results before their big game in Chennai on Friday, March 27.

Rishabh Pant in self-destruct mode? LSG captain trolled for bizarre toss callIPL 2025: LSG captain Rishabh Pant was trolled for his bizarre toss call against SRH at the Uppal Stadium in Hyderabad. Pant was called out by fans for the statements he made at the toss.

I will make Rohit Sharma run 20 km: Yograj Singh reveals India coach aspirationsFormer India cricketer Yograj Singh said he will ensure to get the best out of the likes of Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma if he becomes the head coach of the Indian cricket team. Yograj lashed out at the criticism against the star batters, saying they are 'diamonds' who need to be taken care of.

NFL competition committee proposes replay, kickoff rule changesThe NFL competition committee has introduced proposals to modify replay reviews and kickoffs. If approved, the changes could impact game flow, strategy, and player safety in the upcoming season.

CSK vs RCB: Ruturaj Gaikwad talks up friendship with Rajat Patidar ahead of big clashIPL 2025, CSK vs RCB: As the hype builds up for the big-ticket contest in Chennai on Friday. CSK captain Ruturaj Gaikwad talked up his equation with new RCB skipper Rajat Patidar.

NFL: Russell Wilson says he'll start for Giants in 2025Newly signed QB Russell Wilson declares he will be the Giants' starting quarterback this season. With veteran leadership and championship experience, he's determined to take charge and lead the team to success.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
